Buid IDs: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.1.17) Gecko/20110121 Firefox/3.5.17 and Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

The size and position of the windows are not preserved after updating from Firefox 3.5.17 to Firefox 4.0 RC1 on Mac 10.6.6. After the update both windows are resized to the size of smallest window.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a profile using FF 3.5.17.
2. Open at least 2 FF windows and resize or change the position for one of them.
3. Go to Help -> Check for Updates and install the update.

Expected Results:
After the update is installed, the resize and the position of the windows should be the same as before the update.

Actual Results:
After the update both windows are resized to the size of smallest window.
